{/* End Breadcrump Area */} {/* Start Portfolio Details */}

Greenhouse Control

Interface for a greenhouse electronic automation system, designed and built by myself.

It includes a Chat,Shared Calendar task manager, and I create an PHP API to handle the information received from IoT devices that I also designed and manufactured. Developed with ReactJS and NodeJs. It uses Firebase to store and filter the data. As well, as way to authenticate the users. For the sensors it uses PHP and MySQL. This project it's currently pending of funding and its Intellectual propperty must be protected.

Technologies Used:

ReactJs, NodeJs, HTML, CSS, Php, Firebase, MySQL, C++.
